column2: All Saints offers a wide range of

column1: Our facilities include a large sports hall, squash
courts, a fitness suite, a sports laboratory,
outdoor tennis courts, netball courts, a floodlit
outdoor practice area, outdoor sports pitches
We have sports teams that play at recreational and
competitive level. Affiliated to the British Universities&rsquo
Sports Association (BUSA) and the Northern Universities&rsquo
Leagues (NUL), our teams compete against those from other
universities on Wednesday afternoons and some weekends.
